attributes.action: Take away parking restrictions in London until Covid -19 is finished.
attributes.additional_details: I am scared to see my own family as I am being asked to go on the trains at the time. If the government won't give us full lock down we need support to make this as quick as possible.
attributes.background: While we are being encouraged not to use public transport there is still alot of us who are being asked to go into work. We can't say no in fear of being first to go when cuts are being made. By allowing people to park in London without paying this means less people on the trains.

rejection.details:
Parking restrictions and charges are a matter for local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. Since you started this petition, some councils have introduced exemptions for some essential workers. You should check your local council website for more information.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
